description: Stormy conditions appear as quickly in the day-to-day hustle as they do in the mountains, which is why the Exposure/2™ Gore-Tex Paclite Jacket is so lightweight and packable, it can go anywhere. Whether you're gallivanting the gridlock on your way to the climbing gym or braving the backcountry scouting out camp, this versatile shell perseveres, providing crucial wet-weather protection when you need it most. Made with the most durably waterproof breathable materials, it outlasts the elements and the years so you can count on a lifetime of uninterrupted play.
name: Mountain Hardwear Exposure/2 GTX Paclite Jacket - Mens
